# nirvana Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "nirvana" {
  api_key = "My API Key"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `api_key` (String)
- `base_url` (String) Set the base url that the provider connects to. This can be used for testing in other environments.
